Former Bangladesh left-arm spinner Mosharraf Hossain has died, the country's cricket board said.
The Bangladesh Cricket Board (BCB) announced the demise of Hossain, 40, on twitter.

articles.author: Max Mathews
articles.title: Man United fans label youngster Hannibal Mejbri, 19, as their man-of-the-match against Liverpool - Daily Mail
articles.description: The Red Devils were thrashed 4-0 at Anfield on Tuesday evening in an embarrassingly shoddy performance, after losing 5-0 at Old Trafford against the same opponents back in October.
articles.content:
Manchester United fans have hailed the commitment and fight of Hannibal Mejbri, nominating him man-of-the-match despite playing just nine minutes against Liverpool.
